name: International Co-operative Alliance
goal:
Established in 1895, the International Co-operative Alliance is the apex organisation for co-operatives worldwide.
The Alliance provides a global voice and forum for knowledge, expertise and co-ordinated action for and about co-operatives.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Entrepreneurship & Social Economy
- Youth
- Employment
- Co-operative Development Support
- Regulatory Framework for Co-operatives
- Energy
